snippet: The project, called Initiative 20x20, intends to restore about 49 million acres of degraded land — an area larger than Uruguay — including about 21 million acres in Mexico.
abstract: Conservation groups announce plans at conference on climate change in Peru to restore degraded land across Latin America with financing from private investments; project is effort to cut greenhouse gas emissions by improving productivity of current farmland.
lead_paragraph: The project, called Initiative 20x20, intends to restore about 49 million acres of degraded land — an area larger than Uruguay — including about 21 million acres in Mexico.

headline.main: Investors Recruited to Restore Farmland in Latin America
